title: Labadieville man dies from gunshot wound
content:
A 17-year-old Labadieville man accidentally shot himself in the head Friday evening, Assumption Parish sheriff Mike Waguespack said.
A 17-year-old Labadieville man accidentally shot himself in the head Friday evening, Assumption Parish sheriff Mike Waguespack said.
Dronald Washington, of 117 Violet St., was pronounced dead shortly after being transported to Our Lady of the Lake hospital in Baton Rouge.
Police said that Washington was playing with a .38 caliber revolver in his house when it went off.
Anyone with information regarding this investigation is urged to call the Assumption sheriff's Criminal Investigative division at 526-1627 or the Communications division at 369-2912.
